document_name: Decree No. 1.807 on risk management in land-use planning
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/COL/2014/COL-2014-09-19-Decree No. 1.807 on risk management in land-use planning_6c02de3cfe3ca5ca7046cd00fd37d8a6.pdf
document_description: This Decree establishes the conditions and scales of detail to gradually incorporate risk management in the review of medium and long-term contents of municipal and district land use plans or in the issuance of a new land-use plan.
